#summary Use case 1: Submitting a picture to Photohunt (work in progress).
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Primary Actor =
  * Visitor

= Preconditions =
  * Visitor has the address of the server and is able to send a picture via email using his/her cell phone.
  * Visitor has a picture ready to send.
  * Mail server for Photohunt is up and running.

= Postconditions =
  * Visitor's picture will be available for the photo review process.
  * System will send a reply to the visitor confirming their submission.
